source.name: Total Payments Promised by Clients of Registered Lobbyists in 2012
source.description:
The amount of economic consideration received or expected by the lobbyist or the lobbyist's employer from each client during the reporting period.

Promised payments are disclosed by lobbyists registered with the Ethics Commission on a monthly basis.  This dataset updates automatically on the 19th of every month.

datasets.name: Calendar of Payments Promised to Registered Lobbyists (2010-Present)
datasets.description:
The amount of economic consideration received or expected by the lobbyist or the lobbyist's employer from each client during the reporting period.

Promised payments are disclosed by lobbyists registered with the Ethics Commission on a monthly basis.  This dataset updates automatically on the 19th of every month.

datasets.description:
The amount of economic consideration received or expected by the lobbyist or the lobbyist's employer from each client during the reporting period.

Promised payments are disclosed by lobbyists registered with the Ethics Commission on a monthly basis.  This dataset updates automatically on the 19th of every month.

datasets.name: Lobbyist Activity - Payments Promised By Clients
datasets.description:
The amount of economic consideration received or expected by the lobbyist or the lobbyist's employer from each client during the reporting period.

Promised payments are disclosed by lobbyists registered with the Ethics Commission on a monthly basis.  This dataset updates automatically every night.
